Steve Rogers subsequent versions character see List incarnations Captain America Comic book character Captain America Captain America January Cover art by Jack Kirby Syd Shores Publication information Publisher Marvel Comics First appearance Captain America Comics March Created by Joe Simon Jack Kirby In story information Alter ego Steven Steve Rogers Team affiliations Avengers Avengers Unity Division All Winners Squad Illuminati Invaders Landau Luckman Lake New Avengers Project Rebirth Redeemers S H E L D Secret Avengers Secret Defenders U S Army New York City Police Department Partnerships Bucky Barnes Peggy Carter Falcon Black Widow Iron Man Notable aliases Nomad Captain Abilities via Super Soldier Serum Peak human strength speed durability agility reflexes senses mental processing Master martial artist hand hand combatant Accelerated healing factor Master tactician strategist field commander Wields Vibranium steel alloy shield Captain America fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics Created by cartoonists Joe Simon Jack Kirby character first appeared in Captain America Comics cover dated March from Timely Comics predecessor Marvel Comics Captain America was designed as patriotic supersoldier often fought Axis powers World War II was Timely Comics most popular character during wartime period popularity superheroes waned following war Captain America comic book was discontinued in with short lived revival in Since Marvel Comics revived character in Captain America has remained in publication character wears costume bearing an American flag motif he utilizes nearly indestructible shield which he throws as projectile Captain America alter ego Steve Rogers frail young man enhanced peak human perfection by an experimental serum aid United States government s efforts in World War II Near end war he was trapped in ice survived in suspended animation until he was revived in present day Although Captain America often struggles maintain his ideals as man out his time with its modern realities he remains highly respected figure in his community which includes becoming long time leader Avengers Captain America was first Marvel Comics character appear in media outside comics with release movie serial Captain America Since then character has been featured in other films television series In Marvel Cinematic Universe MCU character was portrayed by Chris Evans in Captain America First Avenger Avengers Captain America Winter Soldier Avengers Age Ultron Captain America Civil War Avengers Infinity War Avengers Endgame He had cameos in Thor Dark World Ant Man Spider Man Homecoming Captain Marvel Captain America ranked sixth on IGN s Top Comic Book Heroes All Time in second in list Top Avengers in second in Top best Marvel superheroes list in Contents Publication history Creation Golden Age Silver Bronze Age Modern Age Legal status Fictional character biography th century s Late s s s s s s st century s s Alternate timeline Hydra duplicate Powers abilities Tactician field commander Super Soldier Serum Weapons equipment Antagonists Other versions In other media References External links Publication history Further information List Captain America titles Creation In writer Joe Simon conceived idea Captain America made sketch character in costume wrote name Super American at bottom page Simon said in his autobiography then decided No it didn t work were many Supers around Captain America had good sound it weren t lot captains in comics It was as easy as that boy companion was simply named Bucky after my friend Bucky Pierson star on our high school basketball team Simon recalled in his autobiography that Timely Comics publisher Martin Goodman gave him go ahead directed that Captain America solo comic book series be published as soon as possible Needing fill full comic with primarily one character s stories Simon did not believe that his regular creative partner artist Jack Kirby could handle workload alone didn t have lot objections putting crew on first issue were two young artists from Connecticut that had made strong impression on me Al Avison Al Gabriele often worked together were quite successful in adapting individual styles each other Actually work was not far from that Kirby s If they worked on it if one inker tied three styles together believed final product would emerge as quite uniform two Als were eager join in on new Captain America book but Jack Kirby was visibly upset re still number one Jack assured him It s just matter quick deadline first issue ll make deadline Jack promised ll pencil it all myself make deadline hadn t expected this kind reaction but acceded Kirby s wishes it turned out was lucky that did might have been two Als but was only one Jack Kirby wrote first Captain America book with penciled lettering right on drawing boards with very rough sketches figures backgrounds Kirby did his thing building muscular anatomy adding ideas popping up action as only he could Then he tightened up penciled drawings adding detailed backgrounds faces figures Comic Art Convention program featuring Simon s original sketch Captain America Al Lieberman would ink that first issue which was lettered by Simon Kirby s regular letterer Howard Ferguson Simon said Captain America was consciously political creation he Kirby were morally repulsed by actions Nazi Germany in years leading up United States involvement in World War II felt war was inevitable opponents war were all quite well organized We wanted have our say Golden Age Captain America Comics cover dated March on sale December year before attack on Pearl Harbor but full year into World War II showed protagonist punching Nazi leader Adolf Hitler it sold nearly one million copies While most readers responded favorably comic some took objection Simon noted first issue came out we got lot threatening letters hate mail Some people really opposed Cap stood threats which included menacing groups people loitering out on street outside offices proved so serious that police protection was posted with New York Mayor Fiorello La Guardia personally contacting Simon Kirby give his support Though preceded as patriotically themed superhero by MLJ s Shield Captain America immediately became most prominent enduring that wave superheroes introduced in American comic books prior during World War II as evidenced by unusual move at time premiering character in his own title instead an anthology title first This popularity drew attention complaint from MLJ that character s triangular shield closely resembled chest symbol Shield character In response Goodman had Simon Kirby create distinctive round shield issue which went on become an iconic element character With his sidekick Bucky Captain America faced Nazis Japanese other threats wartime America Allies Stanley Lieber now better known as Stan Lee contributed character in issue in filler text story Captain America Foils Traitor s Revenge which introduced character s use his shield as returning throwing weapon Captain America soon became Timely s most popular character even had fan club called Sentinels Liberty Circulation figures remained close million copies per month after debut issue which outstripped even circulation news magazines such as Time during period After Simon Kirby team moved DC Comics in late having produced Captain America Comics through issue January Al Avison Syd Shores became regular pencillers celebrated title with one generally inking over other character was featured in All Winners Comics Summer Fall Marvel Mystery Comics USA Comics Dec Fall All Select Comics Fall Summer In post war era with popularity superheroes fading Captain America led Timely s first superhero team All Winners Squad in its two published adventures in All Winners Comics Fall Winter was no issue After Bucky was shot wounded in Captain America story he was succeeded by Captain America s girlfriend Betsy Ross became superheroine Golden Girl Captain America Comics ran until issue July at which time series was retitled Captain America s Weird Tales two issues with finale being horror suspense anthology issue with no superheroes Atlas Comics attempted revive its superhero titles it reintroduced Captain America along with original Human Torch Sub Mariner in Young Men Dec Billed as Captain America Commie Smasher Captain America appeared during next year in Young Men Men s Adventures as well as in issues an eponymous title Atlas attempted superhero revival was commercial failure character s title was canceled with Captain America Sept Silver Bronze Age Avengers March Cover art by Jack Kirby George Roussos In Human Torch story titled Captain America in Marvel Comics Strange Tales Nov writer editor Stan Lee artist co plotter Jack Kirby depicted brash young Fantastic Four member Johnny Storm Human Torch in an exhibition performance with Captain America described as legendary World War II s superhero has returned after many years apparent retirement page story ends with this Captain America revealed as an impostor it was actually villain Acrobat former circus performer Torch had defeated in Strange Tales broke two thieves out jail hoping draw police away while trying rob local bank Afterward Storm digs out an old comic book in which Captain America shown be Steve Rogers caption in final panel says this story was test see if readers would like Captain America return According Lee fan response tryout was very enthusiastic Captain America was then formally reintroduced in Avengers March which explained that in final days World War II he had fallen from an experimental drone plane into North Atlantic Ocean spent decades frozen in block ice in state suspended animation hero found new generation readers as leader that superhero team Following success other Marvel characters introduced during s Captain America was recast as hero haunted by past memories trying adapt s society After then guest starring in feature Iron Man in Tales Suspense Oct Captain America gained his own solo feature in that split book beginning following issue Issue March which retold Captain America s origin through issue Nov was period feature set during World War II co starred Captain America s Golden Age sidekick Bucky Kirby drew all but two stories in Tales Suspense which became Captain America with April Gil Kane John Romita Sr each filled in once Several stories were finished by penciller inker George Tuska over Kirby layouts with one finished by Romita Sr another by penciller Dick Ayers inker John Tartaglione Kirby s regular inkers on series were Frank Giacoia as Frank Ray Joe Sinnott though Don Heck Golden Age Captain America artist Syd Shores inked one story each This series considered Captain America volume one by comics researchers historians following s Captain America Comics its s numbering continuation Tales Suspense ended with Aug This series was almost immediately followed by issue Captain America vol Nov Nov part Heroes Reborn crossover issue Captain America vol Jan Feb issue Captain America vol June Dec Captain America vol Jan Aug Beginning with th overall issue Aug Captain America resumed its original numbering as if series numbering had continued uninterrupted after Modern Age As part aftermath Marvel Comics company crossover storyline Civil War Steve Rogers was ostensibly killed in Captain America vol March storyline Rogers return began in issue Rogers was not dead but caroming through time returned present day in six issue miniseries Captain America Reborn Sept March After Rogers return Barnes at Rogers insistence continued as Captain America beginning in one shot comic Captain America Will Wield Shield Feb While Bucky Barnes continued adventuring in pages Captain America Steve Rogers received his own miniseries Steve Rogers Super Soldier as well as taking on leadership position in new Secret Avengers ongoing series Spinoff series included Captain America Sentinel Liberty Sept Aug Captain America Falcon May June s Captain America appeared alongside s Human Torch Sub Mariner in issue miniseries Avengers Invaders mini series Captain America Chosen written by David Morrell penciled by Mitchell Breitweiser depicts dying Steve Rogers final minutes at S H E L D headquarters as his spirit guides James Newman young American Marine fighting in Afghanistan Chosen not part main Marvel Universe continuity During Two Americas storyline that ran in issues series drew controversy similarity between protesters depicted in comic Tea Party movement Particularly drawing scorn was panel protester holding sign that read Tea Bag Libs Before They Tea Bag Also drawing controversy were remarks made by Falcon implying that crowd racist In his column on Comic Book Resources Marvel Comics Editor in Chief Joe Quesada apologized sign claiming that it was mistake added by letterer at last minute character first as agent Steve Rogers later after resuming his identity as Captain America appeared as regular character throughout Avengers series from issue July through its final issue January character appeared as agent Steve Rogers as regular character in Secret Avengers series from issue July through issue March character made guest appearances as Captain America in issues final issue series March Marvel stated in May that Rogers following public death Bucky Barnes in Fear Itself miniseries would resume his Captain America identity in sixth volume Captain America by writer Ed Brubaker artist Steve McNiven Captain America title continued from issue featuring team up stories with Bucky Hawkeye Iron Man Namor Black Widow title ended its print run with issue Captain America regular character in Uncanny Avengers beginning with issue as part Marvel NOW Captain America vol was launched in November with January cover date by writer Rick Remender artist John Romita Jr On July Marvel Comics announced that mantle Captain America would be passed on by Rogers in most recent storyline has been turned into year old man his long time ally Falcon with series being relaunched as All New Captain America Marvel announced that Rogers will become Captain America once again in comic series Captain America Steve Rogers This new series follows events Avengers Standoff in which Captain America restored his youthful state following an encounter with sentient Cosmic Cube Kobik his past drastically rewritten under instructions Red Skull Afterward Captain America plots set himself Hydra in position they can conquer America in Marvel s event Secret Empire Legal status In Joe Simon sued owners Marvel Comics asserting that he not Marvel was legally entitled renew copyright upon expiration original year term two parties settled out court with Simon agreeing statement that character had been created under terms employment by publisher therefore it was work hire owned by them In Simon filed claim copyright Captain America under provision Copyright Act which allowed original creators works that had been sold corporations reclaim them after original year copyright term but not longer term enacted by new legislation had expired Marvel Entertainment challenged claim arguing that settlement Simon s suit made character ineligible termination copyright transfer Simon Marvel settled out court in in deal that paid Simon royalties merchandising licensing use character Fictional character biography th century s Captain America Comics March Cover art by Joe Simon inks pencils Jack Kirby pencils Steven Rogers was born in Lower East Side Manhattan New York City in poor Irish immigrants Sarah Joseph Rogers Joseph died Steve was child Sarah died pneumonia while Steve was teen By early before America s entry into World War II Rogers tall scrawny fine arts student specializing in illustration comic book writer artist Disturbed by devastation Europe by Nazis Rogers attempts enlist but rejected due his frail body His resolution attracts notice U S Army General Chester Phillips Project Rebirth Rogers used as test subject Super Soldier project receiving special serum made by Dr Josef Reinstein later retroactively changed code name scientist Abraham Erskine serum success transforms Steve Rogers into nearly perfect human being with peak strength agility stamina intelligence success program leaves Erskine wondering about replicating experiment on other human beings process itself has been inconsistently detailed While in original material Rogers shown receiving injections Super Serum origin was retold in s Comic Code Authority had already put veto over graphic description drug intake abuse thus Super Serum was retconned into an oral formula Erskine refused write down every crucial element treatment leaving behind flawed imperfect knowledge steps Thus Nazi spy Heinz Kruger killed him Erskine s method creating new Super Soldiers died Captain America in his first act after his transformation avenges Erskine In origin story in Tales Suspense Kruger dies running into machinery but not killed by Rogers in Captain America revisions Rogers causes spy s death by punching him into machinery Unable create new Super Soldiers willing hide Project Rebirth fiasco American government casts Rogers as patriotic superhero able counter menace Red Skull as counter intelligence agent He supplied with patriotic uniform his own design bulletproof shield personal side arm codename Captain America while posing as clumsy infantry private at Camp Lehigh in Virginia He forms friendship with camp s teenage mascot James Buchanan Bucky Barnes Barnes learns Rogers dual identity offers keep secret if he can become Captain America s sidekick During adventures Franklin D Roosevelt presents Captain America with new shield forged from an alloy steel vibranium fused by an unknown catalyst so effective that it replaces his own firearm Throughout World War II Captain America Bucky fight Nazi menace both on own as members superhero team Invaders as seen in s comic same name Captain America fights in numerous battles in World War II primarily as member st Battalion th Infantry Regiment Blue Spaders Captain America battles number criminal menaces on American soil including wide variety costumed villains Wax Man Hangman Fang Black Talon White Death among others In addition Bucky Captain America was occasionally assisted by Sentinels Liberty Sentinels Liberty was title given members Captain America Comics fan club Captain America sometimes addressed as an aside as characters in Captain America Comics stories In late April during closing days World War II Captain America Bucky try stop villainous Baron Zemo from destroying an experimental drone plane Zemo launches plane with an armed explosive on it with Rogers Barnes in hot pursuit pair reaches plane just before takeoff Bucky tries defuse bomb it explodes in mid air Rogers hurled into freezing waters North Atlantic Both are presumed dead though it later revealed that neither had died Late s s Captain America appeared in comics next few years changing from World War II era hero fighting Nazis confronting United States newest enemy Communism revival character in mid s was short lived events during that time period are later retconned show that multiple people operated using code name explain changes in character These post World War II successors are listed as William Naslund Jeffrey Mace last these other official Captains William Burnside was history graduate enamored with Captain America mythos having his appearance surgically altered resemble Rogers legally changing his name Steve Rogers becoming new s Captain America He administered himself his pupil James Jack Monroe flawed incomplete copy Super Serum which made no mention about necessary Vita Ray portion treatment As result while Burnside Monroe became new Captain America Bucky they became violently paranoid often raving about innocent people being communist sympathizers during height Red Scare s insanity forced U S government place them in indefinite cryogenic storage until they could be cured mental illness Monroe would later be cured assume Nomad identity s s Years later superhero team Avengers discovers Steve Rogers body in North Atlantic After he revives they piece together that Rogers has been preserved in block ice since surviving his enhancements from Project Rebirth block began melt after Sub Mariner enraged that an Inuit tribe worshipping frozen figure throws it into ocean Rogers accepts membership in Avengers his experience in individual combat service his time with Invaders makes him valuable asset He quickly assumes leadership has typically returned that position throughout team s history Captain America Dec Captain America becomes Nomad Cover art by Gil Kane Frank Giacoia Captain America plagued by guilt having been unable prevent Bucky s death Although he takes young Rick Jones closely resembles Bucky under his tutelage he refuses some time allow Jones take up Bucky identity not wishing be responsible another youth s death Insisting that his hero move on from that loss Jones convinces Rogers let him don Bucky costume but this partnership lasts only short time disguised Red Skull impersonating Rogers with help Cosmic Cube drives Jones away Rogers reunites with his old war comrade Nick Fury similarly well preserved due Infinity Formula As result Rogers regularly undertakes missions security agency S H E L D which Fury public director Through Fury Rogers befriends Sharon Carter S H E L D agent with whom he eventually begins romantic relationship Rogers later meets trains Sam Wilson becomes superhero Falcon first African American superhero in mainstream comic books characters established an enduring friendship adventuring partnership sharing series title some time as Captain America Falcon two later encounter revived but still insane s Captain America Although Rogers Falcon defeat faux Rogers Jack Monroe Rogers becomes deeply disturbed that he could have suffered his counterpart s fate During this period Rogers temporarily gains super strength series dealt with Marvel Universe s version Watergate scandal making Rogers so uncertain about his role that he abandons his Captain America identity in favor one called Nomad emphasizing word s meaning as man without country During this time several men unsuccessfully assume Captain America identity Rogers eventually re assumes it after coming consider that identity could be symbol American ideals not its government it s personal conviction epitomized he later confronted corrupt Army officer attempting manipulate him by appealing his loyalty m loyal nothing General except American Dream Jack Monroe cured his mental instability later takes up Nomad alias Sharon Carter believed have been killed while under mind control Dr Faustus s s Captain America February Rogers as Captain vs John Walker as Captain America Cover art by Kieron Dwyer Al Milgrom s included run by writer Roger Stern artist John Byrne Stern had Rogers consider run President United States in Captain America June an idea originally developed by Roger McKenzie Don Perlin Stern in his capacity as editor title originally rejected idea but later changed his mind about concept McKenzie Perlin received credit idea on letters page at Stern s insistence Stern additionally introduced new love interest law student Bernie Rosenthal in Captain America Aug Writer J M DeMatteis revealed true face full origin Red Skull in Captain America had Captain America take on Jack Monroe Nomad as partner time heroes gathered by Beyonder elect Rogers as leader during stay on Battleworld Homophobia dealt with as Rogers runs into childhood friend named Arnold Roth gay Mark Gruenwald became writer series with issue July wrote issues consecutive years from until Sept most issues by any single author in character s history Gruenwald created several new foes including Crossbones Serpent Society Other Gruenwald characters included Diamondback Super Patriot Demolition Man Gruenwald explored numerous political social themes as well such as extreme idealism Captain America fights anti nationalist terrorist Flag Smasher vigilantism he hunts murderous Scourge Underworld Rogers receives large back pay reimbursement dating back his disappearance at end World War II government commission orders him work directly U S government Already troubled by corruption he had encountered with Nuke incident in New York City Rogers chooses instead resign his identity then takes alias Captain replacement Captain America John Walker struggles emulate Rogers ideals until pressure from hidden enemies helps drive Walker insane Rogers returns Captain America identity while recovered Walker becomes U S Agent Sometime afterward Rogers avoids explosion methamphetamine lab but drug triggers chemical reaction in Super Soldier serum in his system combat reaction Rogers has serum removed from his body trains constantly maintain his physical condition retcon later establishes that serum was not drug per se which would have metabolized out his system but in fact virus like organism that effected biochemical genetic change This additionally explained nemesis Red Skull at time inhabited body cloned from Rogers cells has formula in his body his altered biochemistry Rogers body begins deteriorate time he must wear powered exoskeleton eventually placed again in suspended animation During this time he given transfusion blood from Red Skull which cures his condition stabilizes Super Soldier virus in his system Captain America returns crime fighting Avengers Following Gruenwald s departure from series Mark Waid took over resurrected Sharon Carter as Cap s love interest title was then relaunched under Rob Liefeld as Cap became part Heroes Reborn universe issues before another relaunch restored Waid title in an arc that saw Cap lose his shield time using an energy based shield as temporary replacement Following Waid s run Dan Jurgens took over introduced new foe Protocide failed recipient Super Soldier serum prior experiment that successfully created Rogers Some time after this Rogers original shield was retrieved but subtle damage sustained during battle with Beyonder resulted in it being shattered vibranium cancer being triggered that would destroy all vibranium in world with Rogers nearly being forced destroy shield before confrontation with villain Klaw saw Klaw s attacks unwittingly repair shield s fractured molecular bonds negate cancer st century s In aftermath September terrorist attacks Rogers reveals his identity world establishes residence in Red Hook neighborhood Brooklyn New York as seen in Captain America vol June Feb Following disbandment Avengers in Avengers Disassembled story arc Rogers now employed by S H E L D discovers Bucky alive having been saved deployed by Soviets as Winter Soldier Rogers resumes his on again off again relationship with S H E L D agent Sharon Carter After mass supervillain break out Raft Rogers Tony Stark assemble new team Avengers hunt escapees In company wide story arc Civil War Rogers opposes new mandatory federal registration super powered beings leads underground anti registration movement After significant rancor danger public as two sides clash Captain America voluntarily surrenders orders Anti Registration forces stand down feeling that fight has reached point principle originally cited by anti registration forces has been lost In story arc Death Captain America Rogers fatally shot by Sharon Carter whose actions are manipulated by villain Dr Faustus miniseries Fallen Son Death Captain America June Aug examines reaction stunned superhero community Rogers assassination with each five issues focusing different character s reaction Bucky takes on mantle Captain America per Rogers antemortem request Captain America Reborn Aug reveals that Rogers did not die as gun Sharon Carter had been hypnotized into firing at Rogers caused his consciousness phase in out space time appearing at various points in his lifetime Although Rogers manages relay message future by giving time delayed command Vision during Kree Skrull War Skull returns Rogers present he takes control Rogers mind body Rogers eventually regains control with help from his allies defeats Skull In subsequent one shot comic Captain America Will Wield Shield Rogers formally grants Bucky his Captain America shield asks him continue as Captain America President United States grants Rogers full pardon his anti registration actions s This article s plot summary may be long excessively detailed Please help improve it by removing unnecessary details making it more concise August Learn remove this template message Promotional art Steve Rogers Super Soldier Sept by Carlos Pacheco Tim Townsend Following company wide Dark Reign Siege story arcs Steve Rogers character became part Heroic Age arc President United States appoints Rogers in his civilian identity as America s top cop head nation s security replacing Norman Osborn as tenth Executive Director S H E L D Superhuman Registration Act repealed Rogers re establishes superhero team Avengers spearheaded by Iron Man Thor Bucky as Captain America volume issue needed In miniseries Steve Rogers Super Soldier he encounters Jacob Erskine grandson Professor Abraham Erskine son Tyler Paxton one Rogers fellow volunteers in Super Soldier program volume issue needed Shortly afterward Rogers becomes leader Secret Avengers black ops superhero team volume issue needed During Fear Itself storyline Steve Rogers present threat Serpent known Following apparent death Bucky at hands Sin in form Skadi Steve Rogers ends up changing into his Captain America uniform Avengers New Avengers are fighting Skadi Serpent ends up joining battle breaks Captain America s shield with his bare hands Captain America Avengers teams end up forming militia last stand against forces Serpent it comes final battle Captain America uses Thor s hammer fight Skadi until Thor manages kill Serpent In aftermath battle Iron Man presents him with his reforged shield now stronger its uru infused enhancements despite scar it bears It then revealed that Captain America Nick Fury Black Widow are only ones know that Bucky actually survived fight with Skadi as Bucky resumes his identity as Winter Soldier In Avengers vs X Men story arc Captain America attempts apprehend Hope Summers X Men She targeted vessel Phoenix Force destructive cosmic entity Captain America believes that this Phoenix Force dangerous entrust in one person seeks prevent Hope from having it Cyclops X Men believe that Phoenix Force will save race oppose Captain America s wishes result series battles that eventually take both teams blue area moon Phoenix Force eventually possesses five X Men present leaving Avengers at an extreme disadvantage Phoenix Five become corrupted by power Phoenix are eventually defeated scattered with Cyclops imprisoned turning world into police state murdering Charles Xavier after being pushed far only him note that in end he was proven right about Phoenix s intentions From Captain America proceeds assemble Avengers Unity Squad new team Avengers composed both classic Avengers X Men After Cyclops was incarcerated Steve accepted Avengers should have done more help mutants allowed world hate them he started planning new sub team Avengers in hopes unifying mutant humankind alike He chose Havok lead his team become new face represent mutants as Professor X Cyclops once were volume issue needed first threat was return Red Skull more specifically clone Skull created in kept in stasis in event original s death usurped Professor X s body provide himself with telepathic powers which he would use provoke citizens New York into mass assault against mutants anyone could be one force Scarlet Witch Rogue allow themselves be attacked With help S Man Honest John he managed even manipulate Thor volume issue needed Red Skull s skills were still erratic could not completely control Captain America an attack against him was enough distraction lose control Rogue Scarlet Witch After being overpowered by rest Uncanny Avengers Red Skull escapes but promises return In aftermath both Rogue Scarlet Witch joined team volume issue needed During battle with an enemy called Iron Nail Super Soldier Serum within Rogers s body was neutralized causing him age rapidly match his chronological age over years No longer able take part in field missions but retaining his sharp mind Rogers decided take on role as mission coordinator organizing Avengers plans attack from mansion while appointing Sam Wilson as his official replacement as Captain America various Avengers X Men were inverted into villains several villains inverted into heroism due miscast spell by Scarlet Witch Doctor Doom Rogers not only coordinated efforts Spider Man inverted villains now called Astonishing Avengers but also donned his old armor battle inverted Falcon until heroes villains could be returned normal with aid White Skull inverted Red Skull During Time Runs Out storyline Steve Rogers wears armor he confronts Iron Man ensuing fight between two old friends led Steve Rogers force Iron Man admit that he had lied him all allies he had known about incursions between alternate Earths all along but Iron Man also confessed that he wouldn t change thing final incursion started Earth started approaching Earth while Iron Man Steve Rogers kept fighting Earth s S H E L D launched full invasion destroy Earth Tony Stark Steve Rogers were crushed by Helicarrier As part All New All Different Marvel Steve Rogers became new Chief Civilian Oversight S H E L D He returned Uncanny Avengers team now using Schaefer Theater as headquarters Steve Rogers later has an encounter with an alternate Logan from Earth After defeating Logan bringing him Alberta Canada Rogers tried reassure Logan that this was not his past by showing him adamantium frozen body Earth s Logan This sight reminds Logan need enjoy being alive rather than brooding over ghosts his past Although he told Steve Rogers he had experienced in his timeline Logan declined Steve s offer help Alternate timeline Hydra duplicate This article s plot summary may be long excessively detailed Please help improve it by removing unnecessary details making it more concise January Learn remove this template message During Avengers Standoff storyline Steve Rogers learns from Rick Jones that S H E L D has established Pleasant Hill gated community they use Kobik transform villains into ordinary citizens Rogers brought Pleasant Hill he confronts Maria Hill about Kobik project argument interrupted Baron Helmut Zemo Fixer restore inmates normal After Hill injured Rogers convinces Zemo let Hill get medical attention Rogers then escorted Dr Erik Selvig s clinic by Father Patrick Selvig tells Rogers that Kobik at Pleasant Hill Bowling Alley During an attempt reason with Kobik Rogers attacked by Crossbones Before Rogers can be killed Kobik uses her abilities restore him back his prime Declaring that It s good be back Steve defeats Crossbones as Captain America Winter Soldier catch up with him They resume search Kobik discover that Baron Zemo had Fixer invent device that would make Kobik subservient them Rogers rallies heroes so that they can take fight Zemo In aftermath incident Steve Sam plan keep happened at Pleasant Hill under wraps time being In Captain America Steve Rogers July final panel apparently revealed that Rogers has been Hydra double agent since his early youth This subsequently revealed be result Kobik s restoration Rogers youth as she had been taught by Red Skull that Hydra was good world having mind four year old child Kobik changed reality so that Rogers would be greatest man he could be believing Hydra be good Kobik permanently altered his memories so that Rogers believed that he had always been member Hydra Some Rogers original heroic attributes remain intact such as covering death another Hydra member within S H E L D Erik Selvig as well as knowing Jack Flag s tragic life his immortality which Steve pushes him from Zemo s airplane resulting in coma not death Additionally it revealed that Rogers abusive father Joseph was actually killed by Hydra that Hydra deceived him into thinking Joseph died heart attack It also revealed that Rogers witnessed his mother Sarah being killed by Sinclair s Hydra goons kidnapped him which reason Steve held grudge towards Hydra s evilness plans kill Red Skull s clone restore Hydra s lost honor As part his long term plans Steve further compromised Sam Wilson s current image as Captain America by using his greater familiarity with shield deliberately put Wilson in position he would be unable use shield save senator from Flag Smasher with final goal demoralizing Sam point he will return shield Rogers his own free will not wanting kill Wilson risk creating martyr During Civil War II storyline with discovery new Inhuman Ulysses has ability predict future by calculating complex patterns Rogers has set out prevent Ulysses from learning his true plans allegiance Rogers does this by forcing certain predictions on him such as anonymously providing Bruce Banner with new gamma research provoke vision that would drive Avengers kill Banner although this plan has apparently backfired with recent vision showing new Spider Man standing over dead Steve Rogers Despite this revelation Rogers presents himself as voice reason by allowing Spider Man flee with Thor This inspires doubt in Tony Stark his current stance by suggesting that he just acting against Danvers he does not like being top dog He then goes Washington D C location seen in Ulysses vision talk Spider Man was trying understand vision like he was Captain Marvel attempts arrest Spider Man Tony wearing War Machine armor confronts her two begin fight Later Rogers goes Sokovia joins forces with Black Widow liberate freedom fighters from prison so they can reclaim country After that he goes his base Doctor Selvig expresses concern his plan kill Red Skull He then reveals that he has Baron Zemo in cell planning recruit him He eventually kills Skull after villain captured by Unity Squad Xavier brain fragment extracted by Beast Rogers throwing Skull out window over cliff after Sin Crossbones affirm new allegiance Rogers In Secret Empire storyline Rogers as head S H E L D uses subsequent alien invasion mass supervillain assault in order seize control United States He neutralizes superheroes that might oppose him seeks Cosmic Cube bring about reality in which Hydra won World War II Rick smuggles information about Cube s rewriting Rogers reality remaining free Avengers disheveled bearded man in torn World War II army uniform appears introduces himself as Steve Rogers As Avengers Hydra search fragments shattered Cube it revealed that this amnesic Steve Rogers actually manifestation Rogers existing within Cube itself created by Kobik s memories Rogers before he was converted Hydra as she comes recognize that her decision rewrite Rogers as an agent Hydra was wrong Although Hydra Rogers able mostly reassemble Cosmic Cube Sam Wilson Bucky are able use fragment cube restore memory pre Hydra Rogers in Cube corporeal existence allowing him defeat his Hydra self subsequently using Cube undo most damage caused by Hydra manipulating reality even if physical damage remains Hydra Cap continues exist as separate entity kept trapped in prison he only inmate mocking restored Rogers about challenge he will face rebuilding his reputation even as Rogers muses that this experience will teach everyone not place such blind trust in another Powers abilities Steve Rogers physical transformation from reprint Captain America Comics March Art story by Joe Simon Jack Kirby Tactician field commander Rogers battle experience training make him an expert tactician an excellent field commander with his teammates frequently deferring his orders in battle Avengers X Men Fantastic Four other heroes choose Rogers as leader during Secret Wars Thor says that Rogers one very few mortals he will take orders from follow through gates Hades Rogers reflexes senses are extraordinarily keen He has blended Aikido Boxing Judo Karate Jujutsu Kickboxing gymnastics into his own unique fighting style master multiple martial arts Years practice with his near indestructible shield make him able aim throw it with almost unerring accuracy His skill with his shield such that he can attack multiple targets in succession with single throw even cause boomerang like return from throw attack an enemy from behind In canon he regarded by other skilled fighters as one best hand hand combatants in Marvel Universe limited only by his human physique Although super soldier serum an important part his strength Rogers has shown himself still sufficiently capable against stronger opponents even serum has been deactivated reverting him his pre Captain America physique Stan Lee claimed that he d always been fascinated by fact that although Captain America has least spectacular super power all mantle leadership falls naturally upon him as though he was born command Cap one hardest hero characters write writer cannot use some exotic super power make his episodes seem colorful All he has serve him are his extraordinary combat skills his shield his unquenchable love freedom justice Rogers has vast U S military knowledge often shown be familiar with ongoing classified Defense Department operations He an expert in combat strategy survival acrobatics parkour military strategy piloting demolitions Despite his high profile as one world s most popular recognizable superheroes Rogers has broad understanding espionage community largely through his ongoing relationship with S H E L D Super Soldier Serum Steve Rodgers often considered be pinnacle human potential operates at peak physical performance due his enhancement via Super Soldier Serum Super Soldier Serum enhances all his metabolic functions prevents build up fatigue poisons in his muscles giving him endurance far in excess an ordinary human being This accounts many his extraordinary feats including bench pressing pounds kg as warm up running mile km in less than minute mph km h nearly twice maximum speed achieved by best human sprinters Furthermore his enhancements are reason he was able survive being frozen in suspended animation decades He highly resistant hypnosis gases that could limit his focus secrets creating super soldier were lost with death its creator Dr Abraham Erskine In ensuing decades have been numerous attempts recreate Erskine s treatment only have them end in failure Even worse attempts have instead often created psychopathic supervillains which Captain America s s imitator Nuke are most notorious examples Weapons equipment Further information Captain America s shield Captain America s shield Captain America has used multiple shields throughout his history most prevalent which nigh indestructible disc shaped shield made from unique combination Vibranium Steel alloy an unknown third component that has never been duplicated called Proto Adamantium shield was cast by American metallurgist Dr Myron MacLain was contracted by U S government from orders President Franklin D Roosevelt create an impenetrable substance use tanks during World War II This alloy was created by accident never duplicated although efforts reverse engineer it resulted in discovery adamantium Captain America often uses his shield as an offensive throwing weapon first instance Captain America s trademark ricocheting shield toss occurs in Stan Lee s first comics writing two page text story Captain America Foils Traitor s Revenge in Captain America Comics May legacy shield among other comics characters includes time traveling mutant superhero Cable telling Captain America that his shield still exists in one possible futures Cable carries it into battle brandishes it as symbol without his trademark shield Captain America sometimes uses other shields made from less durable metals such as steel even photonic energy shield designed mimic vibranium matrix Rogers having relinquished his regular shield Barnes carried variant energy shield which can be used with either arm used either block attacks as an improvised offensive weapon able cut through metal with relative ease Much like his Vibranium shield energy shield can be thrown including ricocheting off multiple surfaces returning his hand Captain America s uniform made fire retardant material he wears lightweight bulletproof duralumin scale armor beneath his uniform added protection Originally Rogers mask was separate piece material but an early engagement had it dislodged thus almost exposing his identity prevent recurrence situation Rogers modified mask with connecting material his uniform an added benefit which was extending his armor cover his previously exposed neck As member Avengers Rogers has an Avengers priority card which serves as communications device Captain America has used custom specialized motorcycle modified by S H E L D weapons laboratory as well as custom built battle van constructed by Wakanda Design Group with ability change its color disguise purposes red white blue fitted store conceal custom motorcycle in its rear section with frame that allows Rogers launch from vehicle riding it Antagonists Main article List Captain America enemies Captain America has faced numerous foes in over years published adventures Many his recurring foes embody ideologies contrary American values that Captain America shown strive believes in Some examples these opposing values are Nazism Red Skull Baron Zemo neo Nazism Crossbones Doctor Faustus technocratic fascism AIM Arnim Zola Communism Aleksander Lukin amoral capitalism Roxxon Energy Corporation anarchism Flag Smasher international domestic terrorism Hydra Other versions Main article Alternative versions Captain America In other media Main articles Steve Rogers Marvel Cinematic Universe Captain America in other media References IGN s Top Comic Book Heroes IGN Archived from original on June Retrieved July Top Avengers IGN April Archived from original on November hero with nearly million copies his comic sold per month CS maint extra text authors list link Cronin p b Thomas Roy Stan Lee s Amazing Marvel Universe New York New York Sterling Publishing p ISBN line reads With speed thought he sent his shield spinning through air other end tent it smacked knife out Haines hand It became convention starting following issue in which art in Simon Kirby comics story illustrates following caption Captain America s speed thought action save Bucky s life as he hurls his shield across room Daniels Les Marvel Five Fabulous Decades World s Greatest Comics New instrumental in bringing back Sub Mariner in Fantastic Four May it seemed only natural that he would help usher in Captain America Thomas Roy August Stan Lee s Amazing Marvel Interview Alter Ego From Blue Spader Avenger Marvel superhero Captain America served with Big Red One United States Army Archived from original on November Steve Rogers known fans worldwide as Captain America served with st Infantry Division s th Infantry Regiment also known as Blue Spaders during World War II as shown in Mythos Captain America comic written by Paul Jenkins with art by Paolo Rivera Simon Joe Kirby Black History Lesson Pt Marvel Comics Archived from original on February Quoting Marvel Senior Vice President Publishing Tom Brevoort Falcon was very first African American super hero as opposed Black Panther preceded him but wasn t American DeFalco s in Gilbert p Black Panther may have broken mold as Marvel s first black super hero but he was from Africa Falcon was first black American super hero Introduced by Stan Lee artist Gene Colan Sam Snap Wilson was former community volunteer Olshevsky George December Heroes From Tales Suspense Book One Captain America Marvel Comics Index G T in s he student used it turn themselves into new versions Captain America Bucky Englehart Steve w Buscema Sal p Verpoorten John i Turning Point Captain America March Englehart Steve n d Captain
